short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save images as PNG with a random file name.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save as PNG a Chrome extension is a specialized tool designed with a single purpose: to enable you to save any image from the internet as a PNG file with a random file name. With a focused functionality, the extension provides a straightforward and efficient solution for quickly archiving images in a preferred format.

Key Features:
Save Images as PNG: Save images in the widely supported PNG format with just a few clicks. Preserve image quality and compatibility across various platforms and devices.
Randomized File Names: Each saved image is assigned a unique and random file name, ensuring organization and preventing naming conflicts.
Streamlined and Intuitive: The extension is designed to be user-friendly, allowing for a seamless and hassle-free image saving experience.
Efficient Workflow: By automating the image saving process and eliminating the need for manual conversions, the extension helps you save time and effort.
Experience the convenience of saving images in PNG format with randomized file names using the Image Saver Chrome extension. Simplify your image archiving tasks and enhance your browsing experience with this dedicated tool.

Install the Image Saver Chrome extension now and start saving images effortlessly in the preferred PNG format with random file names!
